solution_line_template: If Aaron is {aaron_age} years old, and his sister is {sister_age_multiplier} times as old as him, then the sister is {sister_age_multiplier}*{aaron_age} = <<{aaron_age}*{sister_age_multiplier}={sister_age}>>{sister_age} years old.
Together, Aaron and his sister have a total age of {sister_age}+{aaron_age} = <<{sister_age}+{aaron_age}={aaron_sister_combined_age}>>{aaron_sister_combined_age} years
Henry is {henry_age_multiplier} times as old as the sister, meaning he is {sister_age}*{henry_age_multiplier} = <<{sister_age}*{henry_age_multiplier}={henry_age}>>{henry_age} years old.
The three siblings together have a total age of {aaron_sister_combined_age}+{henry_age} = <<{aaron_sister_combined_age}+{henry_age}={total_siblings_age}>>{total_siblings_age} years
